amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to transfer $524.4 million from the National Institute of Minority Health and Health Disparities to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for National Institutes of Health, National Institute of Minority Health and Health Disparities, by $524,395,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 294 (Roll no. 650).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 294 (Roll no. 650).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
